code: export function doQuickSort(array){;var animations=[];console.log('quick array:',array);var start=0;var end=array.length-1;animations.push([-1,end]);quickSort(array,start,end,animations);console.log('sorted:',array);return animations;}function quickSort(arr,start,end,animations){if(start>=end){return;}var index=partition(arr,start,end,animations);quickSort(arr,start,index-1,animations);quickSort(arr,index+1,end,animations);}function partition(arr,start,end,animations){var pivotIndex=start;var pivotValue=arr[end];animations.push([-1,end]);for(var i=start;i<end;i++){if(arr[i]<pivotValue){swap(arr,i,pivotIndex,animations);pivotIndex++;}}swap(arr,pivotIndex,end,animations);return pivotIndex;}function swap(arr,a,b,animations){var temp=arr[a];arr[a]=arr[b];arr[b]=temp;animations.push([-2,a,b]);animations.push([-3,a,b]);}
